member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlOutputType
member.summary: Used with to specify the type of HTML output that is used to export documents.

members.member: Uses absolutely positioned HTML elements to produce the most accurate browser output possible. Supported by browsers that support absolute positioning (Internet Explorer and Netscape versions 4.0 and above, and Mozilla.
Uses traditional HTML tables to layout the document in HTML. Provided to support legacy browsers.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.BookmarkStyle
member.summary: Values for HtmlExport.BookmarkStyle property.
member.remarks: More styles may be added in future.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.BookmarkStyle.None
member.summary: No bookmark page will be created.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.BookmarkStyle.Html
member.summary: An HTML page containing bookmark links to the document's pages will be created if the ActiveReports' document originally contained bookmarks.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlCharacterSet
member.summary: Values for HtmlExport.CharacterSet property.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlCharacterSet.Big5
member.summary: Known as "Chinese for Taiwan Multi-byte set". Charset name is "Big5".

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlCharacterSet.EucJp
member.summary: Known as "Extended UNIX Code Packed Format for Japanese". Charset name is "EUC-JP".

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlCharacterSet.HzGb2312
member.summary: Known as "ASCII Printable Characters-Based Chinese Character Encoding" per RFC1842 and RFC1843. Charset name is "HZ-GB-2312".

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlCharacterSet.Ibm850
member.summary: Known only as "IBM850". Charset name is "IBM850".

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlCharacterSet.Iso2022Jp
member.summary: Known as "Japanese Character Encoding for Internet Messages" per RFC1468. Charset name is "ISO-2022-JP".

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlCharacterSet.Iso2022Kr
member.summary: Known as "Korean Character Encoding for Internet Messages" per RFC1557. Charset name is "ISO-2022-KR".

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlCharacterSet.Iso8859_1
member.summary: Known as "Latin alphabet No. 1". Charset name is "ISO-8859-1".

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlCharacterSet.Iso8859_2
member.summary: Known as "Latin alphabet No. 2". Charset name is "ISO-8859-2".

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlCharacterSet.Iso8859_5
member.summary: Known as "Latin/Cyrillic alphabet". Charset name is "ISO-8859-5".

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlCharacterSet.Iso8859_6
member.summary: Known as "Latin/Arabic alphabet". Charset name is "ISO-8859-6".

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlCharacterSet.Koi8r
member.summary: Known as "Russian Net Character Set". Charset name is "KOI8-R".

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlCharacterSet.Ksc5601
member.summary: Known as "Unified Hangeul" (Korean). Charset name is "KSC5601".

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlCharacterSet.ShiftJis
member.summary: Characterset name is "shift-jis". Known as "Shift-JIS" (Japanese).

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlCharacterSet.UnicodeUtf16
member.summary: An encoding for the Unicode character set in little-endian byte order using UTF-16 encoding.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlCharacterSet.UnicodeUtf8
member.summary: An encoding for the Unicode character set using UTF-8 encoding

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport
member.summary: ActiveReports HTML export component.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.WebView
member.summary: For internal use only. If true, the data-action attribute will be added to hyper- and bookmark links.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.Export(GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Document.SectionDocument,System.String)
member.summary: Exports the specified document to html.
member.param: The ActiveReports Document object to export.

The file name and path to save the main html file to. If multiple filenames are generated (such as images, or table of contents pages) this argument's value will be used as a prefix for the other file names.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.Export(GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Document.SectionDocument,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Exports the specified document to HTML.
member.param: The file name and path to save the main html file to. If multiple filenames are generated (such as images, or table of contents pages) this argument's value will be used as a prefix for the other file names.
A range of page numbers to export seperated by a comma. Between each comma can have a single page number, or range of pages with a hyphen between the starting and ending page numbers in the range.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.Export(GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Document.SectionDocument,System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Exports the specified to HTML in a MIME MHT format (as can be saved from Internet Explorer) which includes the HTML and all images in a single file.
member.param: The destination to save the MHT file to.
A range of page numbers to export seperated by a comma. Between each comma can have a single page number, or range of pages with a hyphen between the starting and ending page numbers in the range.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.Export(GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Document.SectionDocument,GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.IOutputHtml,System.String)
member.summary: Provides advanced control over how the HtmlExport stores all output, including all html pages, images, bookmark pages, etc...
member.param: The ActiveReports Document to export to HTML.
An implementation of that will receive all HTML output.
A range of page numbers to export seperated by a comma. Between each comma can have a single page number, or range of pages with a hyphen between the starting and ending page numbers in the range.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.Export(GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Document.SectionDocument,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Exports the specified to HTML in a MIME MHT format (as can be saved from Internet Explorer) which includes the HTML and all images in a single file.
member.param: The destination to save the MHT file to.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.OnHyperlink
member.summary: Hyperlinks preprocessor if required.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.OutputType
member.summary: Sets or returns the type of HTML output that is used to export documents.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.IncludePageMargins
member.summary: Sets or returns whether the Page's margins are included in the output.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.RemoveVerticalSpace
member.summary: Sets or returns whether completley empty vertical spacing will be removed from the output.
member.remarks: The property does not have an effect if you are using the default option. This may improve pagination if you wish to print the HTML output from a browser with the option.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.MultiPage
member.summary: Sets returns whether multiple HTML pages are generated for the document. If true, one HTML page will be generated for each page in the ActiveReports document. If false, (the default value) one HTML page is generated for the all pages in the ActieReports document.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.BookmarkStyle
member.summary: Sets returns whether a page of bookmarks will be created if the ActiveReports document contains bookmarks.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.CreateFramesetPage
member.summary: Sets or returns a value indicating that the HTML pages appear in a frame set where any bookmark entries appear on the left, and the report document contents appear on the right. The resulting filename will use the specified filename with the extension ".frame.html".

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.IncludeHtmlHeader
member.summary: Sets or returns a value indicating if the resulting HTML files will include normal HTML page headers such as the HTML, HEAD, and BODY elements.
member.remarks: You can set this value to false if you want to use the resulting HTML output in the middle of another HTML page.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.Title
member.summary: Title used in head of HTML pages.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.CharacterSet
member.summary: Sets or returns the character set encoding that will be used in the outputted HTML pages. The default character set is UTF8. Setting this property will change the meta tag in the header of the resulting HTML pages to the appropriate IANA character set value for example: <META content="text/html;charset=ISO-8859-1" http-equiv=Content-Type>. Additionally, the inner text portion of the pages will be encoded according to the specific character set's encoding rules, as well as font names. If you are exporting a Document without headers (IncludeHtmlHeader=false), then you must insert the appropriate meta tag to ensure the browser knows how the text is encoded.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.Pagination
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicates should pagination be used for resulted html document or not

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport.AddMetadata(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds specified metadata property to be written as HTML meta.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExportException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs in the ActiveReports HTML export assembly.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.OutputHtmlFiles
member.summary: OutputHtmlFiles is an implementation of IHandleHtmlOutput that directs the HtmlExport object's output to files.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.OutputHtmlFiles.htmlExport
member.summary: The HtmlExport instance that is requesting the file output. Can be used to check property settings on HtmlExport.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.OutputHtmlFiles.#ctor(System.String,GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Section.HtmlExport)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the OutputHtmlFiles class using the specified filePath as the base html page.
member.param: The file path to the main/starting HTML page. Other file names (such as linked in images and table of contents pages) will use this filepath as a prefix.
The parent object this object is working with.
member.remarks: When this class is created, it demands permission to write files in the parent folder of the specified file. If permision is not granted, a SecurityException will be thrown.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Page.Settings
member.summary: Settings for the Html rendering extension.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Page.Settings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Page.Settings.#ctor(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Page.Settings.Mode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode to use when rendering to html
member.value: A indicating the rendering mode to use.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Page.Settings.LinkTarget
member.summary: Gets or set the target for hyperlinks contained inside the report.By default this value is not set.
member.remarks: You can target a window by specifying the window name, or specify to open the target in a new window by setting the value to _blank.
member.value: A string value representing the LinkTarget.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Page.Settings.MhtOutput
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not to output should be in Mht format.True indicates the output should be in Mht format; otherwise false. The default is false.
member.value: A boolean value indicating whether or not the output should be in Mht format.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Page.Settings.Fragment
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not the full html text will be return or just the contents contained inside the body tag.True indicates only the content inside the body tag will be return; otherwise false. The default is false.
member.value: A boolean value indicating whether or not to return the full html contents, or just the contents inside the body tag.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Page.Settings.StyleStream
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not the CSS style information will be contained inside the html file, or inside a different stream. True indicates the CSS style information will be contained in its own stream; otherwise false. The default is true.
member.value: A boolean value indicating whether or not to write the CSS style information to a different stream, or embed it in the html file.
member.remarks: When this value is set to False the full report will be rendered before being returned.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Page.Settings.EmbedImages
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not the images content will be contained inside the html file as Base64, or inside a different stream.
member.value: A boolean value indicating whether or not to write the images content to a different stream, or embed it in the html file.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Page.Settings.OutputTOC
member.summary: Indicates whether the report's TOC(is exists) should be added in the output.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Html.Page.Settings.RenderingEngine
member.summary: Indicates whether we should use SVG internally or not.

member.summary: Performs an implicit conversion from to .
